title: Product Manager - App Ads
summary: At Apple, we work every day to build products that enrich people’s lives. Our Advertising Platforms group makes it possible for people around the world to easily access informative and imaginative content on their devices while helping publishers and developers promote and monetize their work.
description:
- As an App Ads product owner, you'll work across Product, Data Insights (data scientists & analysts), and Engineering teams to design & deliver data specifications to enable near & long-term strategic projects in our app ads business
- Define product features/enhancements and communicate requirements to Engineering teams via clearly written requirements documents, diagrams, and concise verbal communication
- Work closely with the Data Insights and Engineering teams to enable them to identify the critical path, prioritize and execute upon requirements
- Synthesize insights from research, customer meetings (internal and external), platform engagement, and sales feedback to prioritize improvements and new feature ideas that will deliver business objectives and customer benefits
- Collaborate with partner product managers, Engineering, and Data Insights teams on the relevant feature delivery strategy and plans
key_qualifications:
3+ years of technical product management experience with at least one entire product development cycle from concept to launch
Experience with designing and deploying compliance solutions at scale
Strong technical and analytical abilities including proficiency with SQL
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills; ability to clearly articulate product vision, product strategy and requirements to engineers and internal business partners
Experience working closely with cross-functional teams and product stakeholders to define and drive product strategy and roadmap
Ability to build durable relationships, influence without authority, sell concepts internally, and actively drive decision-making across organizations
Self-motivated, thrives in a fast-paced environment with a high degree of ownership and accountability, and able to work efficiently to make continued progress on multiple priorities
BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics or related areas
preferred_qualifications:
Prior experience working within Ad-Tech or similar domain
MS in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics or related areas
pay_benefits:
At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.

Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits.

Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
